subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: On a day when the Mets looked to plug one hole, moving Gee from the bullpen to the rotation, another leak emerged, as Murphy played half an inning before he was sidelined by tightness in his right hamstring.
snippet: On a day when the Mets looked to plug one hole, moving Gee from the bullpen to the rotation, another leak emerged, as Murphy played half an inning before he was sidelined by tightness in his right hamstring.
